In Jinja2, I'm trying to create two blocks with the same name 'title' in the base template, with one in the TITLE tag and the other in the H1 tag. The aim is to use the same title in these two places, which is provided by other derived templates. However, I'm encountering an error that says "block 'title' defined twice". How can I resolve this issue? Here is the template code I'm using: ``` {% block title %}{% endblock %} - example.com [...]

{% block title %}{% endblock %} - example.com

``` And here is the error message I'm receiving: ``` lines = [self.message, ' ' + location] : block 'title' defined twice ```
